message.content:
I have put together a meal plan for you based on the restrictions mentioned. Each day will include breakfast, lunch, dinner, and a snack to help satisfy your hunger throughout the week. Please note that these meals are designed for variety and not necessarily calorie-counted or portioned. Adjust serving sizes as needed.

Day 1:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with fresh berries and chopped banana
- Lunch: Roasted vegetable quinoa bowl
- Dinner: Stir-fried tofu with mixed vegetables and brown rice
- Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus

Day 2:
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach, tomato, and avocado
- Lunch: Vegetable soup with whole grain crackers
- Dinner: Baked salmon with a side of roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli
- Snack: Apple slices with peanut butter (if peanuts are allowed)

Day 3:
- Breakfast: Smoothie made from frozen berries, banana, almond milk, and protein powder
- Lunch: Lentil salad with bell peppers, cherry tomatoes, and olives
- Dinner: Zucchini noodles with marinara sauce and grilled chicken
- Snack: Rice cakes topped with nut-free spread (e.g., sunflower seed butter)

Day 4:
- Breakfast: Chia pudding made from almond milk, chia seeds, and fresh fruit
- Lunch: Kale salad with lemon dressing and chickpeas
- Dinner: Thai curry with tofu, mixed vegetables, and brown rice
- Snack: Cucumber slices with a low-sodium vegetable dip

Day 5:
- Breakfast: Vegetable frittata with bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes
- Lunch: Grilled portobello mushroom "burgers" on whole grain bread with lettuce, tomato, and avocado
- Dinner: Baked tilapia with roasted cauliflower and asparagus
- Snack: Popcorn made without dairy or nuts

Day 6:
- Breakfast: Whole grain waffles topped with fresh fruit and a drizzle of maple syrup (instead of honey)
- Lunch: Lentil and quinoa salad with a side of steamed edamame
- Dinner: Shrimp stir-fry with mixed vegetables, brown rice, and a gluten-free teriyaki sauce
- Snack: Green smoothie made from spinach, banana, almond milk, and protein powder

Day 7:
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with avocado, tomatoes, and whole grain toast
- Lunch: Pasta primavera with whole grain pasta, mixed vegetables, and a side of roasted chickpeas
- Dinner: Grilled chicken wrap with lettuce, bell peppers, cucumber, and low-fat creamy dressing
- Snack: Protein bar or snack made without dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, or cashews (check ingredients)
